main.name: Sandeep SD
main.description: Certified in CSM®, CSPO®, SAFe® Agilist (SA), TKP® (Kanban), PRINCE2® and ITIL®
main.bio: I have 5+ years of professional experience in design thinking, full Stack Development, modern JavaScript, Agile methodologies along with Project management skills. I am still heavily interested in technical challenges, I like to solve complex problems and to contribute to the creation of effective, useful and usable software. I am curious learner and open to other technologies.

testimonials.text: He proved high technical and management skills. His sense of humour helped him to integrate perfectly in our team and made things seem easy.

He is an incredibly talented developer but what really makes him stand out is his work ethic and steady approach. He has been very professional and very clear in all communications, which I appreciate.
